nbttag: {"id":"minecraft:clay_ball","count":1,"components":{"minecraft:custom_name":"{\"text\":\"Nightmare Nullifier\",\"color\":\"green\"}","minecraft:lore":["{\"text\":\"Why have nightmares when you can\",\"color\":\"gray\"}","{\"text\":\"drink coffee instead?\",\"color\":\"gray\"}","{\"text\":\"\"}","{\"text\":\"\",\"extra\":[{\"text\":\"* \",\"color\":\"dark_gray\",\"bold\":true},{\"text\":\"Co-op Soulbound \",\"color\":\"dark_gray\"},{\"text\":\"*\",\"color\":\"dark_gray\",\"bold\":true}]}","{\"text\":\"UNCOMMON\",\"color\":\"green\",\"bold\":true}"],"minecraft:custom_data":{"id":"NIGHTMARE_NULLIFIER"},"minecraft:hide_additional_tooltip":{}}}
